titleStmt.title: To the supream authority the Parliament of the Common-VVealth of England. A remonstrance humbly presented by Thomas Wilkes, on behalfe of all the old distressed officers, souldiers, and other creditors upon the publique faith, within this nation, for satisfaction of all their just debts due before 1647. Shewing the severall lamentable conditions of many of them for want of the same, with a visible way for their satisfaction and reliefe.
titleStmt.author: Wilkes, Thomas, fl. 1652.

titleStmt.title: To the supream authority the Parliament of the Common-VVealth of England. A remonstrance humbly presented by Thomas Wilkes, on behalfe of all the old distressed officers, souldiers, and other creditors upon the publique faith, within this nation, for satisfaction of all their just debts due before 1647. Shewing the severall lamentable conditions of many of them for want of the same, with a visible way for their satisfaction and reliefe.
titleStmt.author: Wilkes, Thomas, fl. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; dated at end: 19th. of July, 1652.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
